titleStmt.title: Innocency no shield against envy A sermon preached on Friday, April 11. being the fast-day appointed by the Kings proclamation to seek reconciliation with God, &c. By George Topham, rector of Boston in Lincolnshire. Perused and approved of by the right Reverend father in God, Thomas, Lord Bishop of Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Topham, George, d. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Fox, and are to be sold at his shop at the Angel in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Angel in Westminster-Hall
